articles.author: Anna Mehler Paperny
articles.title: Why the Latin American community in Toronto has been hit hard by COVID - Reuters
articles.description: In a pandemic that has hit marginalized people hardest, Latin Americans in Canada's largest urban area have been particularly at risk: They're more likely to be hospitalized with COVID-19 than any other ethnoracial group, according to the most recent data ava…

articles.title: Joe Panik, Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hit homers as Blue Jays beat Astros - Reuters
articles.description: Joe Panik hit a three-run homer, Vladimir Guerrero Jr. added a two-run shot and the Toronto Blue Jays defeated the visiting Houston Astros 6-2 on Saturday afternoon at Buffalo, N.Y.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Dye & Durham gets C$3.4 bln offer from management-led group - Reuters
articles.description: Dye & Durham Ltd (DND.TO), a Canadian cloud-based software maker, has received a buyout offer from a management-led shareholder group worth about C$3.4 billion ($2.8 billion), less than a year after its flotation on the Toronto Stock Exchange.

articles.title: UPDATE 1-Ontario court dismisses SIB's $4.5 bln case against TD Bank - Reuters
articles.description: The Ontario Superior Court of Justice has dismissed Stanford International Bank's (SIB) $4.5 billion damages claim against Toronto-Dominion Bank over its role in a massive Ponzi scheme, SIB said on Wednesday.

articles.title: Jays rally for 6 in ninth to overcome 6 HRs by Orioles - Reuters
articles.description: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hit a go-ahead two-run double in a six-run ninth and the visiting Toronto Blue Jays came back to defeat the Baltimore Orioles 10-7 Saturday afternoon.
